mapper.select: SELECT s.id ,s.date ,s.employee_id ,e.name ,t.clock_in ,t.clock_out ,SUBTIME(t.clock_out, t.clock_in) AS work_time ,t.created_at ,t.updated_at FROM test_shift_schedules AS s LEFT JOIN test_time_records AS t ON s.id = t.shift_id INNER JOIN test_employees AS e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE MONTH(s.date) = #{targetMonth} ORDER BY s.date ASC ;

SELECT s.id ,s.date ,s.employee_id ,e.name ,t.clock_in ,t.clock_out ,SUBTIME(t.clock_out, t.clock_in) AS work_time ,t.created_at ,t.updated_at FROM test_shift_schedules AS s LEFT JOIN test_time_records AS t ON s.id = t.shift_id INNER JOIN test_employees AS e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE MONTH(s.date) = #{targetMonth} AND s.employee_id = #{employeeId} ;
SELECT DISTINCT e.id ,e.name FROM test_shift_schedules s INNER JOIN test_employees e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE MONTH(s.date) = #{targetMonth} ;

SELECT s.id ,s.date ,t.clock_in ,t.clock_out ,s.employee_id ,e.name FROM test_shift_schedules AS s LEFT JOIN test_time_records AS t ON s.id = t.shift_id INNER JOIN test_employees AS e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE s.id = #{shiftId} ;
